summary: Providing for the improvement of Courtland Place South from South Andover St. to South Spokane St.; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Res. No. 22827 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
